function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of safety protocols on construction sites","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict safety protocols and guidelines","Technologies":"Smart wearable devices for contact tracing and monitoring","People":"Construction workers, project team, public agencies","Owner":"Construction managers, project team, public agencies"},{"Description":"Delay in payments for the progress of works","Impact":"Financial strain on construction workers and the industry","Mitigation":"Streamlining payment processes, ensuring financial support for workers","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, financial support programs","People":"Construction workers, construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies, industry regulators"}]}
